projects.title: MMDP online shopping
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MySQL. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather application that displays current weather conditions and forecasts for any location worldwide with beautiful UI and interactive maps.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills with modern design and smooth animations.
